Material used.Material Name: SNCA variants (A30P, A53T) and target protein
Material used.Description: Binding assays were conducted to assess interactions between SNCA variants and target proteins.

Readout description.Result Description: A30P variant showed 30% reduced binding affinity compared to wild-type.
A53T variant demonstrated 20% increased binding affinity compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was tested in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type SNCA protein served as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Buffer without protein was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Unpaired t-test for comparison between variants and controls.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Binding affinity within 10% of wild-type baseline.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Binding affinity deviating by >15% from wild-type baseline.
